mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(name, category, price, manufacturer, stock, description, imageFileName, limitedQuantity) VALUES(#{name}, #{category}, #{price}, #{manufacturer}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{imageFileName}, #{limitedQuantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = #{product.name}, category = #{product.category}, price = #{product.price}, manufacturer = #{product.manufacturer}, stock = #{product.stock}, description = #{product.description}, limitedQuantity = #{product.limitedQuantity}, imageFileName = #{imageFileName} WHERE id = #{id}
